### Transport Canada’s Purchase of Aircraft Equipment

#### Invitation to Supply Arrangement Holders

**Procurement Reference:** RFP-2024-04-09-10

**Publication Date:** April 9, 2024

**Closing Date:** April 30, 2024 at 13:00 (TOT)

Transport Canada is seeking a supplier to provide aircraft equipment to support the operations of the Air Services Directorate. This purchase is governed by a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the terms of RFP-2024-04-09-10.

### Request for Proposal Details

- **Solicitation Title:** Purchase of PN 3075873-01 SAFRAN Unit Data Collector
- **UNSPSC Code:** 25202500 - Aircraft Equipment
- **Canadian Trade Agreement:** Included

The request is open only to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series. Enterprises invited to submit proposals include:
- Bell Textron Canada
- Alpine Aerotech
- Helitrades Inc.
- National Helicopter
- Skyline Helicopters

**Respondent Details:**

- **Respondent Name:** Yula Zourdos
- **Title:** Procurement Specialist
- **Email:** [yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca](mailto:yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (343) 552-8343
- **Address:** T-58, 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, Ontario K1V 7B2

**Additional Information:**

Transport Canada will continue to post notices at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to qualify for the Supply Arrangement. 

**Selection Criteria:** Price - the contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder engaged in a fair trade practice.

**Compliant bidders shall submit their self-certification certificate along with their bid.**  Bid documents will be distributed to eligible proponents directly.
